name: app-drolo-gpt
keywords: Gigya CDC Sites Console Generator gigya SAPCDC nodejs

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run apiDev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run generate-dependency-graphs" "npm run apiDev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.buildProd: rm -rf ./dist && webpack --mode production --config webpack.server.config.js && webpack --mode production --config webpack.prod.config.js && cd client && npm run build
scripts.installDeps: cd client && yarn install && pwd && cd ../ && yarn install
scripts.clean: rimraf node_modules && rm -r yarn.lock && cd client && npm run clean && cd ../
scripts.generate-client-dependency-graph: cd client && depcruise --max-depth 2 --exclude "^(node_modules|forks|__tests__|jshint)" --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > ./public/img/digraph/dependencygraph-client.svg
scripts.generate-dependency-graphs: npm run generate-server-dependency-graph && npm run generate-client-dependency-graph
